statements: SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis
SELECT species_name, class_name, order_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis
SELECT species_name, family_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE genus_name = 'Homo'
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE species_name = 'Lion'
SELECT species_name, class_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE class_name = 'Mammal'
SELECT genus_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE order_name = 'Carnivora' ORDER BY genus_name DESC
SELECT family_name, class_name, genus_name FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE species_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY family_name, class_name
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticAnalysis WHERE genus_name LIKE '%ea%'
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM EvolutionaryRelationship;
SELECT ancestor_species_id, descendant_species_id FROM EvolutionaryRelationship;
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_name = 'Lion';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species WHERE genus_name = 'Canis';
SELECT species_name FROM Species WHERE genus_name = 'Felis' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT ancestor_species_id, descendant_species_id, relationship_type FROM EvolutionaryRelationship WHERE relationship_type = 'common ancestor' AND ancestor_species_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EvolutionaryRelationship ORDER BY descendant_species_id, ancestor_species_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Phylogeny WHERE parent_phylogeny_id IS NULL;
SELECT species_id, COUNT(*) FROM Phylogeny GROUP BY species_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EvolutionaryEvents WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC, species_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EvolutionaryEvents WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT species_name, genetic_data FROM Species INNER JOIN Phylogeny ON Species.species_id = Phylogeny.species_id WHERE Phylogeny.parent_phylogeny_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT e.event_name, p.species_id, s.species_name FROM EvolutionaryEvents e LEFT JOIN Phylogeny p ON e.phylogeny_id = p.phylogeny_id LEFT JOIN Species s ON p.species_id = s.species_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT genus_name, genus_id FROM Genus ORDER BY genus_name ASC;
SELECT family_name, family_id FROM Family WHERE family_id = 'some_specific_id';
SELECT tree_id, tree_name FROM PhylogeneticTree WHERE tree_data->>'branch' = 'example_branch';
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticTree ORDER BY tree_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species WHERE species_name = 'Lion';
SELECT * FROM Genus ORDER BY genus_name DESC;
SELECT family_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Family GROUP BY family_name;
SELECT tree_id, tree_name FROM PhylogeneticTree WHERE tree_data->>'type' = 'mammal';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, region FROM Species WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT s.species_id, s.species_name, f.family_name FROM Species s INNER JOIN Family f ON s.species_id = f.family_id;
SELECT g.genus_name, f.family_name, c.class_name FROM Genus g INNER JOIN Family f ON g.family_id = f.family_id INNER JOIN Class c ON f.family_id = c.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Genus ORDER BY genus_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, region FROM Species WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT genus_name, family_name FROM Genus JOIN Family ON Genus.family_id = Family.family_id;
SELECT species_name, region, family_name FROM Species JOIN Genus ON Species.species_id = Genus.genus_id JOIN Family ON Genus.family_id = Family.family_id WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM Class JOIN Order ON Class.class_id = Order.order_id ORDER BY Class.class_name ASC;
